localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: AirConsole Meet lets you instantly play games with your team in Zoom, Google Meet or any other video conferencing service. The games allow colleagues to bond together while working from home. Perfect for team building during the pandemic.
blogPost.body: AirConsole Meet lets you instantly play games with your team in Zoom, Google Meet or any other video conferencing service. The games allow colleagues to bond together while working from home. Perfect for team building during the pandemic.
blogPost.title: AirConsole Meet - Play games in video calls with your team
blogPost.author: Rafael Morgan

localize.description: AirConsole Meet让您可以在Zoom、Google Meet或任何其他视频会议服务中与您的团队即时玩游戏。这些游戏可以让同事们在家中工作的同时团结在一起。非常适合在流行病期间进行团队建设。
localize.tagline: 与你的团队在视频通话中玩游戏

localize.description: AirConsole Meet讓您可以在Zoom、Google Meet或任何其他視頻會議服務中與您的團隊即時玩遊戲。這些遊戲可以讓同事們在家中工作的同時團結在一起。非常適合在流行病期間進行團隊建設。
localize.tagline: 與你的團隊在視頻通話中玩遊戲

next.excerpt: With Upvoty, you can easily collect and manage all of your customer's feedback. Share your roadmap and communicate updates with the Changelog. Now, all available in Dark mode! 🖤
next.title: Upvoty Dark Mode - User feedback, roadmap, and changelog in dark mode 🖤

localize.description: 使用Upvoty，您可以轻松收集和管理所有客户的反馈。分享您的路线图，并通过变更日志沟通更新。现在，所有这些都可以在黑暗模式下使用 🖤
localize.tagline: 黑暗模式下的用户反馈、路线图和变更日志 🖤。

localize.description: 使用Upvoty，您可以輕鬆收集和管理所有客戶的反饋。分享您的路線圖，並通過變更日誌溝通更新。現在，所有這些都可以在黑暗模式下使用 🖤
localize.tagline: 黑暗模式下的用戶反饋、路線圖和變更日誌 🖤。
